name: ChibiMaw
description:
CHIBIMAW!

You really shouldn't eat that!

You control a disembodied mouth that is being assault by all kinds of food and other objects.  Eat the food, don't eat the other stuff, and be careful to manage your allergies!

Unlock more food and hazards along the way through Lunch lootBoxes.

ChibiMaw is a small arcade game made for OMGJam 4. 

The themes are: Food, Gravity and Loot
